channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Broken street lights on foot path, 1st September
item.description:
These lights do not switch on at night and it is dangerous for pedestrians when cycles come through at night, my friend was hit by a cyclist when walking home because they were not able to see her walking.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Deal Porters Way, Rotherhithe, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damaged pathway/road surface, 1st September
item.description:
Heavy subsidence to pathway/road way and causing damage to adjacent property

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dalrymple Close, Southgate, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: I don’t know if it is Voi but it’s been here for about 2 weeks, 1st September
item.description:
Put here about 2 weeks ago and chained to railing which I have been told is illegal and also partly blocks emergency entrance

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 40, Wallbutton Road, New Cross Gate, London

item.title: Graffiti on Waterloo Bridge information sign, 1st September
item.description:
As well as the rest of the bridge this tourist information sign has been tagged

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Victoria Embankment, Holborn, London

item.title: Walford Road covered in Best Turkish Lebab rubbish, 1st September
item.description:
Walford Road pavements littered in Best Turkish Kebab Takeaway. Are we waiting until there is a rat infestation to deal with this? Please may the council take it seriously

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Walford Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street Light on Post not working, 1st September
item.description:
This was reported by myself on 23rd July 2025. Got a reply from Council (on 30th July 2025) to report back after 4 weeks. It's been a month now and not yet fixed. The area is so dark for pedestrians to walk and it is a danger.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Park Crescent, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Whole pavement blocked in two places adjacent to Tube station, 1st September
item.description:
Barriers fallen over Pavement blocked Stacked wood Dangerous to pass Impassable by people in wheelchairs Forces pedestrians to walk in road without protection Right by the Tube so heavy footfall Absolutely some of the worst roadworks I've seen Needs to be sorted ASAP and council should come down hard on these developers

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elephant and Castle, Elephant and Castle, London
Report on FixMyStreet
